mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_number( length, prefix, serial_no, rule_no, no_name) VALUES ( #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prefix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
